lead_paragraph: CHARNAY GORMAN-- Patricia. My lovely and deeply loved wife, Pat, passed away on March 11, 2016, at Calvary Hospital. Pat was a cosmetics copywriter, an avid birdwatcher and dog lover. Her greatest talent, though, lay in making and maintaining lasting friendships with family, co-workers, fellow birdwatchers, and most everyone else she met during her life. She was my Shining Star! She will be profoundly missed. Michael Gorman 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CHARNAY GORMAN, PATRICIA
